article_text:
Lightkeepers: Dr. Bob Turlington

Posted Nov. 12, 2015 at 11:27 AM

Updated Nov 12, 2015 at 11:30 AM

article_metadata.description:
Dr. Wade R. “Bob” Turlington brought his training and skills to the Caring Community Center when it opened in 1999, and he has continued to serve in many capacities, including medical director.
He works as a volunteer, so his compensation remains the same whatever he does. “I do it because it is what I like to do,” Turlington said. “It gives me an opportunity to help people and to continue to use my skills.”
Turlington retired and closed his family medical
